name: Defuse under 5
description:
You have under 5 seconds to defuse a bomb.

Made for Ludum Dare 47.

Controls:

Adjust slider to set length of time loop in seconds (4 seconds is recommended for first time). 

WASD or Arrow keys to move.

E to interact with shining objects.

Reload page if caught in loop.

Still a lil busy with life, will make this page prettier tomorrow.
